price: Na ama atakaye pewa daftari lake kwa nyuma ya mgongo wake,
arabic: وَأَمَّا مَنۡ أُوتِيَ كِتَٰبَهُۥ وَرَآءَ ظَهۡرِهِۦ
footnotes: Ama mwenye kupewa daftari lake kwa mkono wa kushoto wake nyuma ya mgongo wake kwa kudharauliwa shani yake,

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wa-ammā man ūtiya kitābahu warāa ẓahrihi
